013package org.apache.juneau.svl.vars;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
017
018/**
019 * A basic if-else logic variable resolver.
020 *
021 * <p>
022 * The format for this var is one of the following:
023 * <ul>
024 *    <li><js>"$IF{booleanArg,thenValue}"</js>
025 *    <li><js>"$IF{booleanArg,thenValue,elseValue}"</js>
026 * </ul>
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * The boolean argument is any string.
030 * <br>The following values are interpreted as <jk>true</jk>:  <js>"true"</js>,<js>"TRUE"</js>,<js>"t"</js>,
031 * <js>"T"</js>,<js>"1"</js>.
032 * <br>All else are interpreted as <jk>false</jk>
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
035 * <p class='bjava'>
036 *    <jc>// Create a variable resolver that resolves system properties and $IF vars.</jc>
037 *    VarResolver <jv>varResolver</jv> = VarResolver.<jsm>create</jsm>().vars(IfVar.<jk>class</jk>, SystemPropertiesVar.<jk>class</jk>).build();
038 *
039 *    <jc>// Use it!</jc>
040 *    System.<jsf>out</jsf>.println(<jv>varResolver</jv>.resolve(<js>"Property $IF{$S{someBooleanFlag},IS,IS NOT} set!"</js>));
041 * </p>
042 *
043 * <p>
044 * Since this is a {@link MultipartVar}, any variables contained in the result will be recursively resolved.
045 * <br>Likewise, if the arguments contain any variables, those will be resolved before they are passed to this var.
046 *
047 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
048 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/SimpleVariableLanguageBasics">Simple Variable Language</a>
049 * </ul>
050 */
051public class IfVar extends MultipartVar {
052
053   /** The name of this variable. */
054   public static final String NAME = "IF";
055
056   /**
057    * Constructor.
058    */
059   public IfVar() {
060      super(NAME);
061   }
062
063   @Override /* MultipartVar */
064   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String[] args) {
065      Utils.assertArg(args.length >= 2 && args.length <= 3, "Invalid number of arguments passed to $IF var.  Must be either $IF{booleanArg,thenValue} or $IF{booleanArg,thenValue,elseValue}");
066
067      String b = args[0].toLowerCase();
068      if ("1".equals(b) || "t".equals(b) || "true".equals(b))
069         return args[1];
070      return args.length == 2 ? "" : args[2];
071   }
072}
